languages.text: "Единственная звезда, яркая звезда, серебряная звезда светила на небе. И когда та сирота улыбнулась ей — Единственная звезда упала с неба прямо в ее руки. Все верные в разных уголках континента, кто увидел след падающей звезды, распознали знамение и отправились искать место падения. И собрались они вместе, и вместе со светом Единственной звезды к ним пришло спасение".

traits.locale_text: "Единственная звезда, яркая звезда, серебряная звезда светила на небе. И когда та сирота улыбнулась ей — Единственная звезда упала с неба прямо ее руки. Все верные в разных уголках континента, кто увидел след падающей звезды, распознали знамение и отправились искать место падения. И собрались они вместе, и вместе со светом Единственной звезды к ним пришло спасение".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "The One Star, the bright star, the silver star shone in the sky. And when the orphan smiled at it — the One Star fell right into her hands. All the faithful in every corner of the continent who saw the trail of the falling star recognised it as an omen and went looking for the place where it landed. And they rallied together, and with the light of the One Star, they found their salvation."
languages.original_text: "Единственная звезда, яркая звезда, серебряная звезда светила на небе. И когда та сирота улыбнулась ей — Единственная звезда упала с неба прямо в ее руки. Все верные в разных уголках континента, кто увидел след падающей звезды, распознали знамение и отправились искать место падения. И собрались они вместе, и вместе со светом Единственной звезды к ним пришло спасение".

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “唯一一颗明亮的星星，命运之星，在天空中闪耀着。当那个孤儿对它露出微笑时，命运之星恰好落在了她的手中。那片大陆的所有虔诚之人，都看到了星星落入人间的那一幕。他们认为这是个预兆，前往星星落下的地方。他们团结起来，在命运之星的光芒下，找到了他们的救赎之路。”
languages.original_text: "The One Star, the bright star, the silver star shone in the sky. And when the orphan smiled at it — the One Star fell right into her hands. All the faithful in every corner of the continent who saw the trail of the falling star recognised it as an omen and went looking for the place where it landed. And they rallied together, and with the light of the One Star, they found their salvation."

traits.locale_text: “唯一一颗明亮的星星，命运之星，在天空中闪耀着。当那个孤儿对它露出微笑时，命运之星恰好落在了她的手中。那片大陆的所有虔诚之人，都看到了星星落入人间的那一幕。他们认为这是个预兆，前往星星落下的地方。他们团结起来，在命运之星的光芒下，找到了他们的救赎之路。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "The One Star, the bright star, the silver star shone in the sky. And when the orphan smiled at it — the One Star fell right into her hands. All the faithful in every corner of the continent who saw the trail of the falling star recognised it as an omen and went looking for the place where it landed. And they rallied together, and with the light of the One Star, they found their salvation."

languages.text: «La Estrella Única, la estrella brillante, la estrella plateada relucía en el cielo. Y cuando la huérfana le sonrió, la Estrella Única cayó en sus manos. Los fieles en todos los confines del continente vieron la estela de la estrella durante la caída y supieron que se trataba de un presagio. Fueron a buscar el lugar donde había caído. Unieron sus fuerzas y, guiados por la luz de la Estrella Única, alcanzaron la salvación».
languages.original_text: "The One Star, the bright star, the silver star shone in the sky. And when the orphan smiled at it — the One Star fell right into her hands. All the faithful in every corner of the continent who saw the trail of the falling star recognised it as an omen and went looking for the place where it landed. And they rallied together, and with the light of the One Star, they found their salvation."

traits.locale_text: «La Estrella Única, la estrella brillante, la estrella plateada relucía en el cielo. Y cuando la huérfana le sonrió, la Estrella Única cayó en sus manos. Los fieles en todos los confines del continente vieron la estela de la estrella durante la caída y supieron que se trataba de un presagio. Fueron a buscar el lugar donde había caído. Unieron sus fuerzas y, guiados por la luz de la Estrella Única, alcanzaron la salvación».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「一つ星、輝く星、銀の星が空に輝いていた。そして、孤児が微笑みかけた時--、一つ星は彼女の手の中に落ちた。降り注ぐ星の軌跡を見た大陸の隅々にいるすべての信仰者たちは、それを前兆と認識し、星が降り注いだ場所を探しに行った。そして彼らは結集し、一つ星の光とともに、救いを見出したのだ」
languages.original_text: "The One Star, the bright star, the silver star shone in the sky. And when the orphan smiled at it — the One Star fell right into her hands. All the faithful in every corner of the continent who saw the trail of the falling star recognised it as an omen and went looking for the place where it landed. And they rallied together, and with the light of the One Star, they found their salvation."

traits.locale_text: 「一つ星、輝く星、銀の星が空に輝いていた。そして、孤児が微笑みかけた時--、一つ星は彼女の手の中に落ちた。降り注ぐ星の軌跡を見た大陸の隅々にいるすべての信仰者たちは、それを前兆と認識し、星が降り注いだ場所を探しに行った。そして彼らは結集し、一つ星の光とともに、救いを見出したのだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Der Eine Stern, der helle Stern, der silberne Stern strahlte am Himmel. Und als das Waisenkind zu ihm emporlächelte, da fiel ihm der Eine Stern geradewegs in die Hände. Sämtliche Gläubigen in allen Winkeln des Kontinents, die den Schweif des fallenden Sterns sahen, erkannten darin ein Omen und suchten nach der Stelle, an der er gelandet war. Und sie versammelten sich und durch das Licht des Einen Sterns fanden sie ihre Rettung."
languages.original_text: "The One Star, the bright star, the silver star shone in the sky. And when the orphan smiled at it — the One Star fell right into her hands. All the faithful in every corner of the continent who saw the trail of the falling star recognised it as an omen and went looking for the place where it landed. And they rallied together, and with the light of the One Star, they found their salvation."

traits.locale_text: "Der Eine Stern, der helle Stern, der silberne Stern strahlte am Himmel. Und als das Waisenkind zu ihm emporlächelte, da fiel ihm der Eine Stern geradewegs in die Hände. Sämtliche Gläubigen in allen Winkeln des Kontinents, die den Schweif des fallenden Sterns sahen, erkannten darin ein Omen und suchten nach der Stelle, an der er gelandet war. Und sie versammelten sich und durch das Licht des Einen Sterns fanden sie ihre Rettung."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « L'Étoile unique, l'étoile étincelante, l'étoile d'argent brillait dans le ciel. Et lorsque l'orpheline lui sourit, l'Étoile unique lui tomba droit dans les mains. Sur tout le continent, les fidèles qui avaient aperçu l'étoile filante reconnurent ce présage et se mirent en quête du lieu de sa chute. Il se réunirent, et dans la lumière de l'Étoile unique, ils trouvèrent leur salut. »
languages.original_text: "The One Star, the bright star, the silver star shone in the sky. And when the orphan smiled at it — the One Star fell right into her hands. All the faithful in every corner of the continent who saw the trail of the falling star recognised it as an omen and went looking for the place where it landed. And they rallied together, and with the light of the One Star, they found their salvation."

traits.locale_text: « L'Étoile unique, l'étoile étincelante, l'étoile d'argent brillait dans le ciel. Et lorsque l'orpheline lui sourit, l'Étoile unique lui tomba droit dans les mains. Sur tout le continent, les fidèles qui avaient aperçu l'étoile filante reconnurent ce présage et se mirent en quête du lieu de sa chute. Il se réunirent, et dans la lumière de l'Étoile unique, ils trouvèrent leur salut. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Emsalsiz Yıldız, o parlak yıldız, gökyüzünde parıldayan o bembeyaz yıldız hariç. Öksüz kız ona bakıp gülümsediğinde Emsalsiz Yıldız, kızın avucuna düşüvermiş. Ana karanın dört bir yanındaki inananlar, düşen yıldızın izini bir alamete yorup düştüğü yeri aramaya koyulmuş. Kol kola girip Emsalsiz Yıldız'ın ışığında kurtuluşlarını bulmuşlar."
languages.original_text: "The One Star, the bright star, the silver star shone in the sky. And when the orphan smiled at it — the One Star fell right into her hands. All the faithful in every corner of the continent who saw the trail of the falling star recognised it as an omen and went looking for the place where it landed. And they rallied together, and with the light of the One Star, they found their salvation."

traits.locale_text: "Emsalsiz Yıldız, o parlak yıldız, gökyüzünde parıldayan o bembeyaz yıldız. Öksüz kız ona bakıp gülümsediğinde Emsalsiz Yıldız kızın avucuna düşüvermiş. Ana karanın dört bir yanındaki inananlar, düşen yıldızın izini bir alamete yorup düştüğü yeri aramaya koyulmuşlar. Kol kola girip Emsalsiz Yıldız'ın ışığında kurtuluşlarını bulmuşlar."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
